page.title: 03Farming
page.content: The main occupation is farming. The majority of the land is owned by four farms; Tannerswhite (Norwood End) owned by Tom East, Butt Hatch (Beauchamp Roding) owned by Mr. Read, Ponders Lodge (Fyfield) owned by Miss Boyton, Warders Hall(Willingale) owned by Mr. Stock. Of the four farmers Mr.Read farms the most. All four are highly mechanised, grow cereal (wheat and barley), rape, peas and potatoes; they keep sheep, pigs, cattle and chickens. The high mechanisation has brought about the biggest change. A freak storm on Sunday, May 26 caused serious damage to the crops ofthree farms,mainly the rape and barley - the barley having to be turned into silage. The path of devastation followed a clear line across the area.
